attributes.action: take all necessary steps to ensure that Oaklands Pool in Southampton remains open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oaklands Community Pool in Southampton is under threat from closure from council cuts.

One political party would take £160,000 out of the budget.Council officers state this will mean closure.

Up and down the country swimming facilities are under threat. 

If we want to compete at the 2012 Olympics we need good, local, swimming facilities
